select:
/*DeductOrderMapper queryInitAndUnConfirmedOrderByPage*/ SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT
FROM T_DEDUCT_ORDER WHERE PARTITION_DATE = #{partitionDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND (DEDUCT_STATUS = 'INIT' OR DEDUCT_STATUS = 'UNCONFIRMED') ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC ) t WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ) a WHERE rnum > #{startIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
